definitions: an ornamental aquatic plant with large round floating leaves and large, typically cup-shaped, floating flowers.

notes.text: Family Nymphaeaceae: several genera and many species, including the white-flowered fragrant water lily (Nymphaea odorata) of eastern North America, and the yellow-flowered Indian pond lily of California (Nuphar polysepalum)

shortDefinitions: ornamental aquatic plant with large round floating leaves and large floating flowers
